archimate:Principle.name: Legal Identity
archimate:Principle.documentation: A set of Attributes sufficient to identify an Identity Owner for the purpose of legal accountability in at least one Jurisdiction. A Legal Identity may be established by one or more valid Credentials from Issuers that are trusted to provide the necessary Attributes.
